data.question: What is the empirical formula of scandacyclopropene 2a?
At what temperature (in Kelvin) were the crystallographic data for 2a-crypt•(THF)2 collected?
What is the space group of the crystal structure for 2b-crypt?
What type of analysis was performed using Multiwfn program?
data.answer: Orbital localization analysis and orbital composition analysis

data.question: What is the role of KC8 in the formation of scandacyclopropene 2a?
data.answer: KC8 acts as a reducing agent in the formation of scandacyclopropene 2a

data.question: Is the formation of scandacyclopropene 2a through oxidative addition of diphenylacetylene to the Sc(I) center possible?
data.answer: No, the formation of scandacyclopropene 2a does not proceed through oxidative addition of diphenylacetylene to the Sc(I) center

data.question: What method was used for the calculation of NICS in the study?
What does the LOL-π analysis in Multiwfn reveal about the electron density?
data.answer: The LOL-π analysis gives a clear picture of the electron density localization at the center of the three-membered ring

data.question: What is the significance of the multicenter bond order (Iring) calculation?
data.answer: The multicenter bond order (Iring) calculation helps in evaluating the aromaticity of the scandacyclopropene unit

data.question: Was the formation of scandacyclopropene 2a confirmed by harmonic frequency calculations?
data.answer: Yes, harmonic frequency calculations confirmed the structure of scandacyclopropene 2a as a local minimum

data.question: What computational package was used for all calculations in the study?
What basis set was used for scandium in the DFT calculations?
What was the purpose of using the B3LYP level in the study?
data.answer: The B3LYP level was used for the optimization of structures and harmonic frequency calculations

data.question: Is the crystal structure of 2a characterized by a one-dimensional coordination polymer?
data.answer: Yes, the crystal structure of 2a presents a one-dimensional coordination polymer

data.question: What does the presence of a delocalized three-center two-electron (3c-2e) aromatic system indicate about scandacyclopropene?
data.answer: It indicates that the scandacyclopropene unit exhibits aromatic characteristics

data.question: What was the role of [2.2.2]­cryptand in the synthesis of uncapped scandacyclopropene?
data.answer: The [2.2.2]­cryptand was added to avoid the influence of the potassium countercation on the bonding mode of scandacyclopropene

data.question: What experimental technique was used to confirm the molecular structures of scandacyclopropenes?
data.answer: X-ray diffraction analysis was used to confirm the molecular structures

data.question: What does the calculated NICS(1)zz value for the three-membered ring in 2a-crypt indicate?
data.answer: The calculated NICS(1)zz value indicates the aromaticity of the scandacyclopropene

data.question: What is the significance of the isomerization stabilization energy (ISE) calculation for the hypothetic dimethylscandacyclopropene?
data.answer: The ISE calculation helps in evaluating the stability and aromaticity of the hypothetic dimethylscandacyclopropene

data.question: What was the outcome of the reaction between scandacyclopropene 2a and phenylacetylene?
data.answer: The reaction produced scandium bis-phenylacetylide along with the release of cis-stilbene
